item.description: Fernando Barbosa is an Engineering Manager, SRE and Observability afficionado. He has experience with distributed systems, cloud computing and software development, as well as preparing talks and workshops. He enjoys talking about containers, Golang, Kubernetes and AWS. He’s also always learning about Diversity, Equity and Inclusion as well as Hiring and Recruiting, and the intersection between these fields. Previously a developer, he got frustrated with how difficult it was to get code into production and decided to study about continuous delivery.

item.title: Talks
item.description: In 2020 I presented Projecting Disposable Containers: How to Handle Signals in Docker and Kubernetes! at TDCOnline Especial BH. Slides and code available online [pt]. Also in 2020 I presented Securing Databases using Vault at Cloud Native São Paulo #15 and São Paulo HashiCorp User Group #8 meetups. Slides and code available online [pt]. I have presented What the Helm!? at DevOpsDays 2019 Florianópolis, where I discussed the trade-offs of the most ubiquitous Kubernetes package manager.
